text: Nearly 99% of Covid-19 patients who are vitamin D deficient die, according to a research study.
Research illustrates a clear correlation between vitamin D deficiencies and (higher) COVID-19 mortality rates.
entity_strings: COVID-19, mortality rates, vitamin D deficiencies

text: Vitamin D levels of 50 ng/mL correlates to zero mortality rate from COVID.

A study on vitamin D and Covid-19 shows an 80% reduction in need for ICU and a 60% reduction in deaths. The study demonstrates that the clear relationship between vitamin D and Covid mortality is causal.
The survival rate for COVID-19 is over 99% for most age groups.
